question: But-1-yne on reaction with dil. <katex>$H_{2}SO_{4}$</katex> in presence of <katex>$Hg^{2+}$</katex> ions at 333 K gives:
explanation: Hydration of alkynes in the presence of <katex>$Hg^{2+}/H^+$</katex> follows Markovnikov's rule. But-1-yne gives an enol intermediate (<katex>$CH_3-CH_2-C(OH)=CH_2$</katex>), which tautomerizes to form the more stable ketone, Butan-2-one (<katex>$CH_3-CH_2-CO-CH_3$</katex>).
